table_data: Impressions increased from 2021 to 2022 primarily driven by Google Ad Manager and AdMob. The increase in cost-per-impression from 2021 to 2022 was driven by a number of interrelated factors including product changes; improvements we have made in ad formats and delivery; changes in device mix, geographic mix, and property mix, partly offset by the unfavorable effect of foreign currency exchange rates.
description: Google Ad Manager and AdMob drove impression growth in 2022 vs. 2021, with a 3% rise in cost-per-impression.
